title: Income Tax Return Due Date for AY 2025-26 Extended!
content:
# Income Tax Return Due Date for AY 2025-26 Extended!

Ek important update hai for all taxpayers! Government ne Assessment Year 2025-26 ke Income Tax Return (ITR) filing ki due date ko extend karne ka announcement kiya hai. This is a much-needed relief, especially for those whose accounts are subject to audit.

*   **Old Due Date (for audited cases):** October 31, 2025
*   **New Due Date (for audited cases):** December 10, 2025
*   **Audit Report Submission Due Date:** The due date for furnishing the report of audit under the provisions of the Act (specifically under Section 44AB) for AY 2025-26 has also been extended to November 10, 2025.

This extension is officialized vide **Circular No. 15/2025 dated October 29, 2025**, issued by the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT). This provides taxpayers, particularly businesses, professionals, and tax auditors, additional time to finalize and file their reports, easing compliance pressure during the festive season and audit-heavy period.
